full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL GYI 'KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL 'KHRUNGS RABS GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS DANG BCAS PA 'DI NI PHYAG MDZAD PA BLO BZANG DBANG RGYAL  TSOG THU DA'I CHING NO YON, SBYIN PA AER KHE NANG SO, ,BSTAN 'DZIN NOM CHE DGE BSGOS, ,'JAM DBYANGS THON GA LAG PI LIG THU, BSTAN PA TSE RING HOR TSA PI LEG THU RNAMS KYIS MDZOD BTAGS CHE BA, SMAN RNYING YUG @006A *, ,MDZAD GOS SER PO, YUG BSOD BTAGS LNGA BCAS BSTABS TE KHAL KHA DO LU'U KHO SHO'U GI SBYIN BDAG GRVA RIGS TSA MANG, NGAG 'DON BGYIS CHOG PA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG SNYOMS LAS PA BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS PHO BRANG PA TA LA'I GZIMS CHUNG NYI 'OD 'KHYIL BAR SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO,
